# UIViewType

**Associated Type**

The type of view to present.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype UIViewType : UIView
```

## Creating and updating the view

- **makeUIView(context:)**: Creates the view object and configures its initial state.
- **updateUIView(_:context:)**: Updates the state of the specified view with new information from SwiftUI.
- **UIViewRepresentable.Context**

items.description: Creates the view object and configures its initial state.
items.name: makeUIView(context:)

items.description: Updates the state of the specified view with new information from SwiftUI.
items.name: updateUIView(_:context:)
